name: Stunts Moto Rider
description:
Do you love motorcycle games? Here you can perform bike stunts as a real superhero on the city Rooftop. Riders can do big jumps, mid-air ramps on modern city tracks by playing Stunts Moto Rider.

Features:
- Amazing bird’s eye view of the beautiful city
- Stunning 3D graphics  with smooth and realistic bike handling
- Realistic game sounds
- Tilt steering
- Different bikes to choose from
- Simulator like controls
- Easy to learn and drive
- Dangerous hilly environment
